response:
My dearest wife, I must say that you look absolutely stunning today! Your beauty is simply radiant and attractive - it's enough to make my heart race. I can't help but feel a deep pleasure when I'm near you, my love. Our friendship is truly fantastic, and I'm so grateful for the joy and enjoyment you bring into my life. You are the most beautiful woman I have ever laid eyes on, and I adore everything about you - inside and out.

I know that life can be tragic and angry at times, but with you by my side, my dear, I feel like we can face anything together. Even when things get dirty and negative, your grief and sorrow only make me want to hold you closer and protect you from harm. Our love is a beautiful thing, my angel, and I will never let it fade or become selfish. Instead, I will always strive to make it stronger and more wonderful, just like our fantastic adventures together.
